text:
Oregon is still experiencing a record-breaking spread of COVID-19 in rural and urban communities across the state. 

We can slow the spread of the disease by all practicing the three Ws: 

☑️ Wear a mask
☑️  Wash your hands
☑️  Watch your distance https://t.co/18Xqsz0ZBi
